con:config.con:query: SELECT TRANSACTIONSID,ENDTOENDID, PAYMENT_REF FROM HST_TRANSACTIONS WHERE INITIATORBANKID="${Properties#orgid}" AND FK_PROCESSINGLINEID=57 ORDER BY TRANSACTIONSID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT TRANSACTIONSID,ENDTOENDID, PAYMENT_REF FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE INITIATORBANKID="${Properties#orgid}" AND FK_PROCESSINGLINEID=57 AND PAYMENTSTATUS='REJC' ORDER BY TRANSACTIONSID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT TRANSACTIONSID,ENDTOENDID, PAYMENT_REF FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE INITIATORBANKID="${Properties#orgid}" AND FK_PROCESSINGLINEID=57 AND PAYMENTSTATUS IN ('WFRE','TERE','PEPE','RFCA') ORDER BY TRANSACTIONSID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="X-EVRY-ESB-SECURITYTOKEN" value="${Properties#SECURITYTOKEN}"/> <con:entry key="X-Nets-Realtime247-RequestId" value="${Properties#LogRef}"/> <con:entry key="X-Nets-Realtime247-CorrelationId" value="${Properties#LogRef}"/> <con:entry key="X-EVRY-ESB-CLIENTNAME" value="${Properties#CLIENTNAME}"/> <con:entry key="paymentcontext" value="${Properties#paymentcontext}"/> <con:entry key="X-EVRY-ESB-USERSESSION" value="${Properties#USERSESSION}"/> <con:entry key="xNetsRealtime247FlowId" value="${Properties#LogRef}"/> <con:entry key="X-EVRY-CLIENT-REQUESTID" value="${Properties#LogRef}"/> <con:entry key="X-EVRY-CLIENT-CLIENTNAME" value="${Properties#CLIENTNAME}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="${Properties#Content-Type}"/> </xml-fragment>
